title: Expiator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, if your Child is alive, you may choose two players. Any visitors of the first player will be redirected to the second. 2 Uses.
- Rave: Can only be used if your Child is dead. Visit a player, causing them and all their good-aligned visitors to have vulnerable defense the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with a random REF player as your Child. They are aware you are their parent and what role you are.
- When your Child dies, it is announced to the town that the Expiator is present.
- Control/RB immune while Child is alive
- If your Child dies, your Destiny becomes "Live to see the town lose".

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: See your child live until the end of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4475
*"I'll tear the land from the sea!" the old man shouted in the graveyard, his eyes full of rage-filled tears, "there is no longer beauty in this forsaken town."*
